title: ROYGBIV: A Pixar Supercut
description:
A one minute supercut examining (and celebrating) Pixar’s use of color.

Edited by Rishi Kaneria (@rishikaneria)
Music by Moderat.

Footage from:
Toy Story
A Bug's Life
Toy Story 2
Monsters, Inc.
Finding Nemo
The Incredibles
Cars
Ratatouille
WALL-E
Up
Toy Story 3
Cars 2
Brave
Monsters University
